name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"ed25058e-4179-4177-bed3-02bb3af05bfb","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"File Overview: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key_err.py","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ce3c64ba-f3a2-46e8-b727-6e9f3b865460","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key_err","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module is a dedicated reporting utility within the Jarvis analysis engine. Its sole purpose is to serve as a specialized sink for "KeyError" vulnerabilities—locations in the target source code where a dictionary access is likely to fail because the requested key does not exist.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3ddf670e-b8c4-4372-99d4-fae802c57401","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By centralizing these detections, the module allows the analyzer to move through complex codebases without stopping, while building a comprehensive list of data-access issues to be presented to the user at the conclusion of the scan.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a7c63f5-85df-4282-a0a1-ec41ad7710ce","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"5facd93f-2b17-4df7-94cc-380ddddf9a05","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Core Purpose and Role","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9783fdc0-9c07-43eb-84f8-e3e0f60ac30e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The primary goal of this module is to manage the lifecycle of a detected bug:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0cef27d-068d-443c-a697-169d1d8ced85","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Issue Aggregation","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It collects disparate errors found during different phases of the analysis (e.g., during AST traversal or pointer resolution) into a single, organized structure.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eba6a3c3-fa23-4868-8d8b-58f0150a05b9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contextual Metadata","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It doesn't just record that an error happened; it captures the "geographic" data (file, line, and namespace) required to understand the bug's impact.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e6b30e9d-eb08-4399-9bca-69b06d977365","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Audit Trail","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It provides a reliable registry for post-analysis reporting, enabling Jarvis to generate JSON reports, CLI tables, or visual markers in a developer's workflow.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a8a05473-94ef-466c-9736-8f8660e1f904","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"931d7f5f-c7c2-4817-9245-f55b564c4540","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c8d2d115-f195-4f7b-864d-c1db54ff5f1d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"23c0ab7a-635a-4ac6-8ca2-904bde176ecc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is the primary data manager for this module. It utilizes a simple list-based storage to maintain a series of error records.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5bf7119c-000c-42db-b353-7baaa2890d82","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Storage","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Every error is converted into a standard dictionary format, ensuring consistency across the entire report.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"77aec04e-a457-4eff-be76-f1da62d60fe4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Interface","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It provides a straightforward ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method for the analyzer and a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method for reporting tools, keeping the error-collection logic separate from the error-detection logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"299cee43-6ea8-42ef-b182-8cdd2dbcb34a","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"4499fd31-a7ed-4100-84f3-558fc0a94290","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"System Integration & Relationship","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"83e66d69-2007-4312-b997-77a184ec6d37","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"key_err","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" module acts as a "logger" for the analysis engine's findings:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e303476f-00d8-487f-a1ae-d7e6d4a2f985","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"From the Analyzer","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": When the points-to analysis or the value tracker determines that a dictionary (represented by a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Pointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") is missing a specific key, it notifies the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"KeyErrors","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" manager.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f2b0afee-e3af-4d57-8c45-2b5361322613","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"To the Reporter","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Once the analysis is complete, the reporting subsystem calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to retrieve the full list of findings.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b5ac86c2-0a67-4514-8af4-75209932e8f8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Developer Feedback","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The metadata stored here is what allows a developer to see a message like: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""Potential KeyError at line 45 of auth.py in function validate_config."","styles":{"italic":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2e02ae28-df36-4d92-9975-ec1043a7082e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"4841c229-4ed3-49f0-8dde-9dedfab38411","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Brief Insight / Tutorial","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5d0cc9fb-4448-4223-90d2-bba70daad030","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Collecting an Error","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bc8904cc-bd96-41c9-861a-1ce1e5be55b8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When a potential vulnerability is found, the engine registers it immediately:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f206d4a-68a2-48ed-8ef1-6e8391e59d5f","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# The analyzer detects a risky access to a 'config' dict
key_err_manager.add(
    filename="settings.py",
    lineno=22,
    namespace="global.init",
    key="database_url"
)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9eab68c8-2cac-493c-b207-fca394c4be63","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Generating a Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"22321f71-e284-469d-b968-584f76e67f61","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"At the end of a scan, the system iterates through the findings to provide a summary:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6bbe293b-4dbb-4be6-baea-4d302d60b717","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"errors = key_err_manager.get()
print(f"Analysis Complete. Found {len(errors)} potential KeyErrors.")

for e in errors:
    # Use the collected metadata to point the developer to the fix
    print(f"[{e['filename']}:{e['lineno']}] Missing key: {e['key']}")","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2d99ca76-a52f-476b-a648-39d5ebeff7b0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This module ensures that Jarvis remains highly organized, keeping diagnostic data separate from the complex logic of code traversal and pointer resolution.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5cffdcd-a1f5-4fce-8e77-0c6489f5f87c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
